import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Mostra } from 'src/app/models/mostra.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-scrolling-card', templateUrl: './scrolling-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./scrolling-card.component.scss'] }) export class ScrollingCardComponent { @Input() mostre: Mostra[]; }
